name: White Dryad Nia

skills.name: Strangling Plants
skills.description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 30% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 4: Damage +5%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 6: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Damage Multiplier: 2.5 DEF

skills.name: Riotous Revival (Cooldown: 4 turns)
skills.description:
Removes all debuffs from a target ally, then heals them by 40% of their MAX HP. If the target of this skill is not this Champion, decrease the cooldown of all of the targetâ€™s skills by 2 turns.
Level 2: Heal +5%
Level 3: Heal +5%
Level 4: Heal +5%
Level 5: Heal +5%
Level 6: Cooldown -1

skills.name: Bark Flesh (Cooldown: 6 turns)
skills.description:
Places a 50% [Ally Protection] buff on all allies except this Champion for 2 turns. Also places a 15% [Strengthen] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Level 2: Cooldown -1
Level 3: Cooldown -1
Level 4: Cooldown -1
